help-file.title: "RAISE SPECTRE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
"Raise Spectre" recalls the soul of the slain to their corpse, creating a spectre. Spectres by nature are rogues, and they are naturally invisible.
